english_measurements.address: 1st Floor, Belapur Bhavan, C.B.D., Navi Mumbai - 400 614
english_measurements.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-7, New Link Road, Malad (W)
english_measurements.subject: Regarding payment of road excavation charges.
english_measurements.reference_2: Estimate submitted by the Executive Engineer, Turbhe on 23/9/2025.
english_measurements.body_summary: This is to inform you that M/s. Bharti Airtel Limited has proposed excavation of a total of 812 meters by Open Trenching method from South Central Road (near HP Petrol pump), Nerul Division to Manish Exports. In this regard, as per the estimate submitted by the Hon. Executive Engineer, you are required to deposit the following excavation charges with the Municipal Corporation.
english_measurements.total_amount_in_words: One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One Only
english_measurements.surface: New Asphalt Surface / Cable through duct / Number of ducts 3 / New Asphalt Surface (Open Trench Method) / Total Sq.Mtr.
